title: Kicked out of champion select?
body: I just had the weirdest thing happen. I was in champion select, I selected my champion (xerath), and then I got kicked out? It said that I left the lobby even though I didn't press anything. That 4 lp loss lol. I was about to start my series.

replies.body:
Did this only happen once, or did it happen a few times? It sucks this happened just before your series. =/

Usually, a disconnection from champ select indicates that your connection was *unstable* to the matchmaking servers. I strongly recommend going through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to address the most common solutions for this issue.

Should you continue to experience this, let me know so we can continue to troubleshoot this together.

I was kicked out for the same issue; however, this has happened a few times to me across 2 accounts. This just started happening recently and has kicked me out of promo’s 2 times now due to this. 

Very pathetic as i play and pay a decent amount. My connection is just fine, not sure why this is happening but it says i’m kicked for inactivity. But i was in the middle of a conversation so not sure why and the last time i just got kicked, it literally just jumped over to me to select a champ
